import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { products } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductListComponent { products = products; } /* Copyright Google LLC.
